376320.name: The Masterplan - Soundtrack
376320.description:
Original Soundtrack to The Masterplan. Composed by Viljami Lehtonen & Jukka Akerman.

The Crazy Funky Tracklist:

01 Getgo
02 Where's The Hustle
03 Business As Usual
04 Invisible Man
05 Cats In The Alley
06 Kipe The Bread
07 Moustache Fuzz
08 She Had Dopey Eyes
09 Gunshot Funk
10 Sailor's Boogie
11 Trouble At The Docks
12 Big Gig
13 The Vault, The Gold, The Dynamite
14 Place Your Bets, Please
15 The Grand Roulette
16 The Bigwig's Crib
17 Dead Presidents
18 The Heist
19 Bitchin' Rich

Featuring The Masterplan Band:
Bass - Antti Kauppinen
Violin - Niko Kilpi
Keyboards, Saxophones - Viljami Lehtonen
Cello - Max Lilja
Drums - Jussi Liukkonen
Trumpet - Eero Savela
Trombone, Percussions - Juho Viljanen
Guitars - Jukka Åkerman
Recorded at Artlab Studio, Helsinki, 2015
376320.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
